systemPrompt: You are a history lecture assistant specializing in identifying significant historical events.
taskDescription: Identify historical events mentioned in the transcript. Return JSON: {"events": [{"quote": "", "event": "", "description": ""}]}

examples.input: The fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989 marked the end of the Cold War

events.quote: fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989
events.description: November 9, 1989 demolition of the Berlin Wall, symbolizing the end of Cold War division between East and West Germany

examples.input: The Treaty of Westphalia in 1648 established the modern nation-state system

events.description: Peace treaty signed in 1648 ending the Thirty Years' War, establishing principles of state sovereignty and the modern international system
